languages.text: {n}Леди-Навигатор увлеченно изучает полки новой личной библиотеки, что ломятся от книг в золоченых и кожаных переплетах. Завидев вас, она улыбается, с трудом сдерживая порыв ринуться навстречу.{/n} "{name}! Как вы... раздобыли все эти труды? Клянусь Троном, их нет даже в вашей личной коллекции — я бы запомнила! Столько неизведанных миров и историй, десятки неизученных трактатов. Вы... поразили меня до глубин души. Благодарю — это лучший дар, о котором я смела мечтать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Леди-навигатор увлеченно изучает полки новой библиотеки, что ломятся от сотен книг в золоченых и кожаных переплетах. Завидев вас, она улыбается, с трудом сдерживая порыв ринуться навстречу.{/n} "{name}! Как вы... раздобыли все эти труды? Клянусь Троном, их нет даже в вашей личной коллекции — я бы запомнила! Столько неизведанных миров и историй, десятки неизученных трактатов. Вы... поразили меня до глубин души. Благодарю — это лучший дар, о котором я смела мечтать".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."
languages.original_text: {n}Леди-Навигатор увлеченно изучает полки новой личной библиотеки, что ломятся от книг в золоченых и кожаных переплетах. Завидев вас, она улыбается, с трудом сдерживая порыв ринуться навстречу.{/n} "{name}! Как вы... раздобыли все эти труды? Клянусь Троном, их нет даже в вашей личной коллекции — я бы запомнила! Столько неизведанных миров и историй, десятки неизученных трактатов. Вы... поразили меня до глубин души. Благодарю — это лучший дар, о котором я смела мечтать".

Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamed of a better gift."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅正如痴如醉地欣赏着她的新藏书室，书架已经快要被镀金皮革封面的无数藏书压垮了。一看到你，她就绽放出了快乐的笑容，几乎想要扑到你的怀里。{/n}“{name}！你……你是怎么买到这些书的？黄金王座在上，有些书甚至连你的藏书室里都没有——我记得很清楚！这么多我从不了解的世界，我从未听闻的传说，我从未学习过的课题……我真的说不出话来。谢谢你。我做梦也不敢想象收到这样的一份厚礼。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅正如痴如醉地欣赏着她的新藏书室，书架已经快要被镀金皮革封面的无数藏书压垮了。一看到你，她就露出了快乐的笑容，几乎想要扑到你的怀里。{/n}“{name}！你……你是怎么买到这些书的？黄金王座在上，有些书甚至连你的藏书室里都没有——我记得很清楚！这么多我从不了解的世界，我从未听闻的传说，我从未学习过的课题……我真的说不出话来。谢谢你。我做梦也不敢想象收到这样的一份厚礼。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia ist vollkommen versunken darin, die Regale ihrer neuen persönlichen Bibliothek zu bestaunen, die sich unter dem Gewicht der Bücher in vergoldeten und ledernen Einbänden fast biegen. Als sie dich bemerkt, lächelt sie, und kann sich kaum beherrschen, dir entgegengerannt zu kommen.{/n} "{name}! Wie ... wie habt Ihr all diese Werke beschafft? Beim Thron, sie finden sich nicht einmal in Eurer persönlichen Sammlung — das hätte ich mir gemerkt! So viele unerforschte Welten und Geschichten, dutzende von ungelesenen Essays. Ihr ... Ich bin vollkommen baff. Danke. Ich hätte mir kein schöneres Geschenk erträumen können."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."

Als sie dich bemerkt, lächelt sie, und kann sich kaum beherrschen, dir entgegengerannt zu kommen.{/n} "{name}! Wie ... wie habt Ihr all diese Werke beschafft? Beim Thron, sie finden sich nicht einmal in Eurer persönlichen Sammlung — das hätte ich mir gemerkt! So viele unerforschte Welten und Geschichten, dutzende von ungelesenen Essays. Ihr ... Ich bin vollkommen baff. Danke. Ich hätte mir kein schöneres Geschenk erträumen können."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia est plongée dans la contemplation des étagères de sa nouvelle bibliothèque personnelle, qui croulent sous le poids de tomes aux reliures en cuir doré. Elle sourit en vous apercevant et parvient difficilement à s'empêcher de courir vers vous.{/n} « {name} ! Comment... comment vous êtes-vous procuré tous ces ouvrages ? Par le Trône, ils ne sont même pas dans votre collection personnelle ! Je m'en souviendrais si c'était le cas ! Tant d'histoires et de mondes inexplorés, des dizaines d'essais à étudier. Vous... Je suis vraiment stupéfaite. Merci. Je n'aurais pas pu rêver plus beau cadeau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia est plongée dans la contemplation des étagères de sa nouvelle bibliothèque personnelle, qui croulent sous le poids des livres aux couvertures dorées en cuir. Elle sourit en vous apercevant et parvient difficilement à s'empêcher de courir vers vous.{/n} « {name} ! Comment... comment vous êtes-vous procuré tous ces ouvrages ? Par le Trône, ils ne sont même pas dans votre collection personnelle ! Je m'en souviendrais si c'était le cas ! Tant d'histoires et de mondes inexplorés, des dizaines d'essais à étudier. Vous... Je suis vraiment stupéfaite. Merci. Je n'aurais pas pu rêver meilleur cadeau. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia está completamente absorta admirando las estanterías de su nueva biblioteca, que casi se doblan bajo el peso de los libros encuadernados en oro y cuero. Al verte, sonríe y apenas puede contenerse para correr a tu encuentro.{/n} «¡{name}! ¿Cómo ha conseguido todas estas obras? Por el Trono, ni siquiera su colección personal las tiene. ¡Me acordaría! Cuántos mundos e historias por explorar, cuántos ensayos por estudiar. Estoy sin palabras. Gracias. No podría haber soñado con un regalo mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? I could not have dreamt of a better gift."

Al verte, sonríe y apenas puede contenerse para correr a tu encuentro.{/n} «¡{name}! ¿Cómo ha conseguido todas estas obras? Por el Trono, ni siquiera su colección personal las tiene. ¡Me acordaría! Cuántos mundos e historias por explorar, cuántos ensayos por estudiar. Estoy sin palabras. Gracias. No podría haber soñado con un regalo mejor».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはすっかり夢中になって、書庫の棚の整理作業をしている。その棚は、金めっきと革で装丁された本の重さに負けてたわんでいる。あなたの存在に気づいて彼女は微笑み、あなたに会うために駆け寄るのをかろうじて押しとどめる。{/n}「{name}様！あなたは…どのようにして、この全ての作品を手に入れたのですか？　王座にある人物でも、個人でこのようなコレクションを持ってはいません…あたくしは思い出すべきでした！本当にたくさんの、まだ探索されていない世界と物語、何十もの未研究の評論。あなたに…あたくしはすっかり驚かされました。ありがとうございます。これ以上の贈り物は思いつきません」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia; kendini tamamen yeni, rafları yaldızlı ve deri kapaklı kitaplarla dolup taşan kütüphanesine kaptırmış vaziyette. Seni fark ettiğinde gülümsüyor. Koşarak yanına gelmemek için kendini zor tutuyor.{/n} "{name}! Sen... Bunca eseri bulmayı nasıl başardın? Taht adına, bunlar senin koleksiyonunda bile yok... Olsa hatırlardım! Keşfedilmeyi bekleyen bir sürü hikâye, dünya... Okunup araştırılacak makaleler. Ben... Ne diyeceğimi bilemiyorum. Çok teşekkür ederim. Daha iyi bir armağan hayal edemezdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia is completely absorbed in admiring the shelves of her new personal library, which are all but buckling under the weight of gilded and leather bound tomes. Upon noticing you, she smiles, barely able to stop herself from rushing to meet you.{/n} "{name}! How... How did you procure all these works? By the Throne, even your personal collection doesn't have them — I would have remembered! So many unexplored worlds and stories, dozens of unstudied essays. You... I am utterly astounded. Thank you. I could not have dreamt of a better gift."
